reviewText: This is an excellent product, for "thinking" people of all ages.  Great witnessing and evangelical tool, especially if you are into apologetics, which I teach.  I highly recommend adding this to your library. Great as a teaching tool to your young children (ages 10 and up).  It teaches them to think and reason properly, with a biblical foundation that is based on truth, not on "feelings".

This is an insightful look at a group of kids discussing how they reach their belief systems, and why.  It's also informative as to how you might defend your faith.  It should be included in every junior high and/or high school curriculum.
